name: @tsoa/core
description: Build swagger-compliant REST APIs using TypeScript and Node

scripts.build: yarn clean && yarn tsc && yarn copy-templates && yarn copy-types
scripts.deploy: yarn version patch -m "Release v%s" && yarn publish
scripts.postversion: git push origin master && git push --follow-tags
scripts.loading-msg-for-tests: echo '... starting a test run to ensure quality. Note this takes some time as tests do not run in parallel (by design) ...'
scripts.test: node ensureYarn.js && tsc -p __tests__/tsconfig.json --noEmit && yarn loading-msg-for-tests && cross-env NODE_ENV=tsoa_test mocha **/*.spec.ts --exit --require ts-node/register --timeout 5000

author: Luke Autry <lukeautry@gmail.com> (http://www.lukeautry.com)
